cvrfdoc.document_title: Red Hat Bug Fix Advisory: Updated Samba packages available for Red Hat Advanced Server
cvrfdoc.document_distribution: Copyright Â© 2020 Red Hat, Inc. All rights reserved.

note:
Updated Samba packages are available for Red Hat Advanced Server which
contain various fixes and updates.

Samba is a suite of utilities which provides file and printer sharing
services to SMB/CIFS clients.
Updated packages for Samba are available for Red Hat Advanced Server. This
update contains various fixes and updates and performs more reliably than
the version it replaces.
